#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int A[102];
int B[102];
int vis[102];

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while ( t-- ) {
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
            cin >> A[i];
            vis[i] = 0;
        }
        for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ) cin >> B[i];
        sort(A, A+n);
        sort(B, B+n);
        int ans = 0;
        for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
            for ( int j = n-1; j >= 0; j-- ) {
                if ( vis[j] ) continue;
                if ( A[i] > B[j] ) {
                    vis[j] = 1;
                    ans++;
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
